description: Blake ... I have to say that Blake ranks among my favorites of Mike's finds. He's just plain fucking sexy. This Marine is a wild card and I could tell what a people person he was in the first images Mike sent me of him where in many of them he had his cell phone jammed next to his ear with a big smile on his face. I knew right away that this one was a talker and liked to shoot the shit. He's so fucking hot, too. Take your time with Blake as he works it up and gets it off for you in this solo scene.
title: Blake (Mike's man)
